original_text: Many pastors have destroyed my vineyard, they have trodden my portion under foot, they have made my pleasant portion a desolate wilderness.
korean_text: 많은 목자가 내 포도원을 헐며 내 몫을 짓밟아서 내가 기뻐하는 땅을 황무지로 만들었도다

sentences.original_text: Many pastors have destroyed my vineyard
they have trodden my portion under foot
they have made my pleasant portion
